questions.question: Which of the following is an example of unsupervised learning in machine learning?
options: Grouping customers based on purchasing behavior without labeled categories
Forecasting sales for the next quarter
Predicting whether an email is spam or not
Predicting the price of a stock based on historical data
correct_answers: Grouping customers based on purchasing behavior without labeled categories
